articles.title: Adam Zampa equals unwanted world record as Klaasen and Miller obliterate Australia - Wisden
articles.description: Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller put on a blistering assault against Australia, thumping Adam Zampa for a harrowing World Record. Read here.
articles.content: Adam Zampa equalled the world record for the most expensive men’s ODI bowling figures in history after Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller unleashed a brutal assault in the fourth ODI of the series bet… [+2636 chars]

articles.title: India has sought Nipah monoclonal antibody from Australia, says ICMR DG - ThePrint
articles.description: Every confirmed patient needs two doses of therapy. In latest outbreak of infectious disease in Kerala, 6 cases have been confirmed of whom two have died.
articles.content: New Delhi: India has sought 20 doses of a monoclonal antibody from Australia’s University of Queensland for the treatment of Nipah virus infection, Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) director … [+2851 chars]
